bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
# dnf install /usr/bin/latex ... Installing : texlive-latex-bin-bin-5:svn14050.0-17.20160520.fc25.1.noarch 116/116 warning: %triggerin(texlive-kpathsea-5:svn41139-17.fc25.1.noarch) scriptlet failed, exit status 2 Non-fatal <unknown> scriptlet failure in rpm package texlive-kpathsea Non-fatal <unknown> scriptlet failure in rpm package texlive-kpathsea Can't locate TeXLive/TLUtils.pm in @INC (you may need to install the TeXLive::TLUtils module) (@INC contains: /usr/share/texlive/tlpkg /usr/local/lib64/perl5 /usr/local/share/perl5 /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl /usr/share/perl5/vendor_perl /usr/lib64/perl5 /usr/share/perl5 .) at /usr/bin/updmap line 41. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/bin/updmap line 41.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): texlive-svn41139-17.fc25.1.
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. mock -r fedora-25-x86_64 --init 2. mock -r fedora-25-x86_64 --install /usr/bin/latex
Actual results: ... Installing : texlive-latex-bin-bin-5:svn14050.0-17.20160520.fc25.1.noarch 186/186 warning: %triggerin(texlive-kpathsea-5:svn41139-17.fc25.1.noarch) scriptlet failed, exit status 2 Can't locate TeXLive/TLUtils.pm in @INC (you may need to install the TeXLive::TLUtils module) (@INC contains: /usr/share/texlive/tlpkg /usr/local/lib64/perl5 /usr/local/share/perl5 /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl /usr/share/perl5/vendor_perl /usr/lib64/perl5 /usr/share/perl5 .) at /usr/bin/updmap line 41. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/bin/updmap line 41.
Expected results: Proper installation.
Additional info:
texlive-2016-19.20160520.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0d29e349a3
*** Bug 1398564 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-871210a6e2

texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-871210a6e2
texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
